use_cases.case: The Cobetia amphilecti KMM 296 genome (JQJA00000000) was used in the construction of a pan-genome for all publicly available Cobetia strains and eight newly sequenced strains.
The Cobetia amphilecti KMM 296 genome (JQJA00000000) was included in a comparative genome content analysis between all publicly available Cobetia strains and eight newly sequenced strains.
The Cobetia amphilecti KMM 296 genome (JQJA00000000) was included in a 16S phylogenetic analysis of all publicly available Cobetia strains and eight newly sequenced strains.
